name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
4 e1 Syllabus, 2008, First Semester
Week	CNN ( No. 96)	Language Skills
1	Introduction	Introduction
2	Plugged in at E3 & Hot Tot Shot	Finding Faults
3	Downtown Drilling in Disguise & Face-to-Face With President Ma 	Your Talk
4	Battling the Bulge & Our Alien Ancestors	Self-examination
5	Gorilla Killer & Organs Made to Order	Impromptu Delivery
6	When Lightening Strikes & Pop Secret	Outline Delivery
7	Sunrise to Sunset in Oslo & Nightwatching	Manuscript Delivery
8		Memorized Delivery
9	Mid-Term	Mid-Term
10		The Voice
11		The Voice
12		Clarity
13		Self-Evaluation
14		Word Choice
15		Word Meaning
16		
17	Review	
18	Final	Final
scorePolicy:
Assessment:

1.Weekly tests and Attendance (20 points maximum deduction). 80%
2.Oral reports and presentations. 20%
